topic: A blog post about using AI to write unit tests for blog posts
audience: Developers familiar with TDD (test driven development) and some interest in AI
audience_knowledge: They know the TDD workflow and have a general understanding of LLMs
audience_care: Because it can help them write better articles
desired_action: I read a book about this, and wrote a tool to help with what that book is teaching
goal: Get people to try out my tool
perspective: I read a book about this, and wrote a tool to help with what that book is teaching
